GitHub_runIntegrationTest.name: GitHub_runIntegrationTest
GitHub_runIntegrationTest.description: Runs the integration test for the GitHub service class

GitHub_createIssue.name: GitHub_createIssue
GitHub_createIssue.description: Creates an issue in a GitHub repository.

parameters.name: projectPathWithNamespace
parameters.description: The full path of the project, e.g., 'owner/repo'.

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: Optional array of labels to add to the issue.

parameters.name: assignees
parameters.description: Optional array of GitHub usernames to assign to the issue.

GitHub_createIssue.returns: A promise that resolves to the created GitHubIssue object.

GitHub_postCommentOnIssue.name: GitHub_postCommentOnIssue
GitHub_postCommentOnIssue.description: Posts a comment on a GitHub issue.

parameters.name: projectPathWithNamespace
parameters.description: The full path of the project, e.g., 'owner/repo'.

parameters.name: issueNumber
parameters.description: The number of the issue to comment on.

GitHub_postCommentOnIssue.returns: A promise that resolves to the created GitHubIssueComment object.

properties.name: user

GitHub_getIssueComments.name: GitHub_getIssueComments
GitHub_getIssueComments.description: Gets all comments for a specific GitHub issue.

parameters.name: projectPathWithNamespace
parameters.description: The full path of the project, e.g., 'owner/repo'.

parameters.name: issueNumber
parameters.description: The number of the issue to get comments for.

GitHub_getIssueComments.returns: A promise that resolves to an array of GitHubIssueComment objects.

properties.name: user

GitHub_cloneProject.name: GitHub_cloneProject
GitHub_cloneProject.description:
Clones a project from GitHub to the file system.
To use this project the function FileSystem.setWorkingDirectory must be called after with the returned value

parameters.name: projectPathWithNamespace
parameters.description: The full project path in GitLab

GitHub_cloneProject.returns: The file system path where the repository is located. You will need to call FileSystem_setWorkingDirectory() with this result to work with the project.

GitHub_getProjects.name: GitHub_getProjects
GitHub_getProjects.returns: The projects available for the account

GitHub_getBranches.name: GitHub_getBranches
GitHub_getBranches.description: Gets the list of branches for a given GitHub repository.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: The project identifier, either as 'owner/repo' string or the numeric repository ID as a string or number.

GitHub_getBranches.returns: A promise that resolves to an array of branch names.

GitHub_listJobsForWorkflowRun.name: GitHub_listJobsForWorkflowRun
GitHub_listJobsForWorkflowRun.description: Lists all jobs for a specific workflow run.

parameters.name: projectPath
parameters.description: The path to the project, e.g., 'owner/repo'.

parameters.name: runId
parameters.description: The ID of the workflow run.

GitHub_listJobsForWorkflowRun.returns: A promise that resolves to an array of workflow job objects.

GitHub_testCreateIssueE2E.name: GitHub_testCreateIssueE2E
GitHub_testCreateIssueE2E.description:
Runs an E2E test for creating an issue in a GitHub repository.
This method will attempt to create a real issue in a pre-defined test repository.
GitHub_testCreateIssueE2E.returns: A promise that resolves to the created GitHubIssue object.

GitHub_getJobLogs.name: GitHub_getJobLogs
GitHub_getJobLogs.description: Fetches the logs for a specific job in a GitHub Actions workflow.

parameters.name: projectPath
parameters.description: The path to the project, typically in the format 'owner/repo'

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The ID of the job for which to fetch logs

GitHub_getJobLogs.returns:
A promise that resolves to the job logs as a string
	 *
